review.practice_name: Mukambika Heart Care ,Yelahanka New Town AND Narayana Multispeciality Hospital

survey_response.review_text: Visited for my mother regular heart check up. Charges heavily at blood tests, get the test done outside, other than that it was overall a good experience.

He might be a good doctor, the first day I went because I had some sort of bradycardia episode, he seemed all too serious and said take this test and that test. The next day with reports, he is all jolly roger, the reports were with me, I was just taking them out and he said it's all fine. It may be that he is so professional and fast that or had a discussion with technician who had just left that he knew everything was all right. The impression I got was that he already knew everything was all right on the first day itself, *** ***** ***** ***** *******. Overall, I at least got to know that there is nothing to be worried about heart wise, but my experience overall was so-so. As for timing, REALLY BAD. First day, over an hour of wait. Second day, over 1.5 hours of wait on the context he was having lunch. I can make and have my own lunch in about 50 mins, so I don't know what that was about and he was not in his office since before I had come, the reception had informed he went for lunch 10-15 mins ago. So, the lunch is about 2 hours I'd say.
Key points: I had no issue, so can't comment on doc's treatment. Time:  3/5, manner of talking:4/5
PS: I am really really thankful he gave me some peace of mind with all the basic checks at leas,t despite the procedure experience, now I can at least stop worrying about that and go on about my daily activities as usual.

****** **** ** *** ******** ** ** * ********** ** *********** ** ** ****** *** ********* never listen to the patients and is always interested in writing up a series of tests. The radiologist after doing the 2D Echo and ECG with NTPro blood test told to recheck with Sanjay Bhat about the holter test which he told us to get done with. We went to him enquiring the same, instead of checking the reports, he started raising his voice **** *** ** *** *********** ** ********* ** ********* *** *********** ** ** *** ********** *********** ** *** **** ** **** ********** ** **** *** *** **** *** ***** **** **** *** ***** ***** *** ** ***** ** *** 

The cost of the 2D Echo, ECG and NTPro was 8900.00***** ********* **** ** ** ********** **** ** *** **** **** ** ********* ** *** ***** *** **** ** *** ** *** ***** ** ** *** *** ******* *** ****** **** ***** 

I was in constant followup with my nephrologist and was following his advice still he kept on shouting and blaming us that we are not attentive.

***** **** ** ****** ***** **** ***. * ***** ****** *** ** *********** ******* * ************ *** *** **** *** ** *** ** ***** ***************** ** **** **** **** ****

He is very rude and snubbed my father who is 75 years old when he asked question. Was only interested in writing expensive tests. Spoke rudely when my father asked if he can for go for TMT instead of MPI test. Didn't bother to explain anything either. **** ***** ******* *** ****** ********* *** ****** ** *******

Dr.Sanjay Bhat is dedicated,thoughtful  and compassionate Doctor.
On 3rd Jan 2023,my dad  got admitted at aster for chest pain immediately did first aid followed by angiogram and angioplasty with stent everything was done so fast.Thanks a ton for his excellent treatment on-time, he is a lifesaver.sending him heartfelt thankfulness and we'll be forever grateful to him
Thanks
Smitha pawar
D/o B.Mohan rao( patient)

review.practice_name: Mukambika Heart Care ,Yelahanka New Town AND Narayana Multispeciality Hospital

survey_response.review_text:
I am very satisfied with my visit as Dr. Sanjay Bhat had arrived on time, made thorough check ups and gave a full detailed explanation of my health issue and what steps to take for rectifying my health. The doctor was also very friendly and polite.

Thanks,
Ananth

We had visited Dr. Bhat after seeing abnormalities in the ECG.  The doctor advised to do  ECO and TMT test.  While the ECO test was absolutely normal, TMT had slight irregularities.  Since my mothers cholesterol was on the higher side, he advised us to do an Angiogram from Aster itself to check the blockage percentage. However we were not convinced as my mother is only 51 *** ***** **** ** ******** ** *** ****** ******* ** ***** ********* Therefore we decided to take a second opinion from our family doctor and third opinion from another cardiologists.  *********** ** ******************* *** *** ********* ***** ****** **** *** ****** ******* **** ******* ********* ** *** ***** *************We are glad that we took a second opinion.

***** *** * ****** *** **** **** ************* keeps it simple to patients. smiles all the time and never makes the patient feel scared but still conveys what has to be.. again approachable and helpful even on holidays and off times. simply doesn't believe in recommending the unwanted..

i thank doctor sanjay bhatt he's very friendly and explained very well ....i take my mother  here for angiogram procceed ur he did very well we're satisfied my mom is feeling better now....if u were finding cardiologist plz go ahead
Understands the problems very clearly and makes patient feel comfortable explaining why treatment required.  Ease of communication and interaction is smooth...

review.practice_name: Mukambika Heart Care ,Yelahanka New Town AND Narayana Multispeciality Hospital

survey_response.review_text: ********* ****** *** good communication with the doctor  i would  suggest visit the clinic take the treatment if required heart care.

Dr. Sanjay Bhat has very large ego(Head weight). He does not want listen patient end, only talks what he want. And if u go to heart related problem he make big fuss out of it and gives lost expensive test which of course comes negative.
** ** **** ************** friendly having top grade medical expertise. He listens to queries and gives satisfactory explanations

review.practice_name: Mukambika Heart Care ,Yelahanka New Town AND Narayana Multispeciality Hospital

survey_response.review_text: doctor was very friendly and took a lot of time to exactly explain everything with patience. wait time was slightly high but understandable as he explains detaily to every patient

Every one will say he is very rude but I think he is very polite person his voice is bold the people think he is speaking rudely Iam a plumnomary hypertension patient before going to him I was not walking still 6min and I was not doing any work after going to him I can walk still 1 hr and 
Iam working and my lifestyle is like a normal person thanks to him I wish him to develop his aim

Dr. Bhat did not clearly exlpain what is needed to properly diagnose my condition. Instead I waited hours, paid huge fees and went home. He even had the audacity to charge RS. 850 to visit me in the e.r. for 10 seconds! Overpriced and overrated hospital!  The critical Care unit charged me 7500 for 2 hours!  They delayed discharge for more than 5 hours!

********* ****** ** * **** ********* ************* Appreciate the patience and demeanor with which he explained my dad's heart condition and necessary course of action that had to be taken on priority under emergency situation. It helped us make an informed decision in a timely fashion. Dad got operated for angioplasty based on his advice to remove block in one of the arteries. Kudos to him!

doctor might not be v friendly, but he speaks the truth fact openly,he diagnoses well, what ever he says that will happen, he is one of the best doctor in Bangalore and India. some people tells that he always asks to undergo some tests and angiograms.. when u ignore it later u suffer.. he can diagnose well and what's going to happen next, he is awesome I recommend everyone

review.practice_name: Mukambika Heart Care ,Yelahanka New Town AND Narayana Multispeciality Hospital

survey_response.review_text:
Visited to consult doctor for mild chest pain, first they want to check all three tests , ECG, ECO, TMT Test. 
At first ECG done. ECG having no issue, then also conducted rest two tests(Rs. 1500 each).
Prescription have no doctor name printed,  ECG report not given to me, but tested first.
Must be written Doctor's Name, Qualification and license number on Prescription
Doctor was informative. Explained clearly about the problem .  Treatment was and hospitality was good.

review.practice_name: Mukambika Heart Care ,Yelahanka New Town AND Narayana Multispeciality Hospital

survey_response.review_text:
Excellent Dr.
Very good humen being and treats patient with care. He gives penty of time to listen patient's every issue and gives very good advice. 

Thanks Dr.

review.practice_name: Mukambika Heart Care ,Yelahanka New Town AND Narayana Multispeciality Hospital

survey_response.review_text: I went to the doctor for treatment of High Blood Presure. His approach for the treatment was very professional and hia own demenour reassuring. Thanks.
Too much wait time without any important fact only sister mentions that Doctor is out for procedure. More than 2 hours waiting is very common that too without sufficient reason.
He is a very straightforward doctor.... He will say as it is. Seems stern but will not give you wrong suggestions.
Satisfied with the experience . Doctor could diagnose the concern quickly and resolve to my satisfaction with proper treatment
** ** * **** **** *******  Reliable and explains about your problems and how to work on it in detail

review.practice_name: Mukambika Heart Care ,Yelahanka New Town AND Narayana Multispeciality Hospital
